about_the_game:
You thought you would spend the rest of your life, fishing in the ocean. Until one day, a single internet popup displayed across your screen that would change your life forever!
Experience a fully featured story including 3 lusty vixens trying to corner the porno market, but beware as there is always competition in this business.

Luckily you have just what they needed, Will you be the one to rock these girls to stardom?



Meet Hannah!
The diva and mean girl of the group! Hannah makes all the costumes and makeup for their movies, as appearances are what she’s all about. Being a bit of a bully, she’ll let you know what she thinks of you. But don’t worry! She’s mostly harmless. Once you get to know her, you’ll be happy to see her soft side, in addition to the pillows on her chest...



Meet Max!
Have you ever been stared at by a rock? That’s what it’s like to hang out with Max. She’s not the best at reading social signals. If you can get past her penetrating stare, though, she’s a very approachable and goofy nerd. She’s the script writer, as she knows all about pop culture. She also has a huge butt!



Meet Helen!
Helen is driven and motivated. She’s the one pulling everything together! Helen seems to have a magic ability to get along with most anybody, and gets what she wants one way or another. Maybe it’s her magic touch. You’d think someone with her skill set would be higher up somewhere, but not everyone starts with the same playing cards.



Who could forget Cassie!
A new face to the gang! Cassie is Hannah’s plug for all kinds of fashion related deals. From genuine top shelf items, to blackmarket knockoffs. She’s not exactly an open book, but one thing is for sure, she is very interested in you!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains depictions of highly erotic sexual content. All characters depicted are over the age of 18.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7 or similar
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compatible
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

name: Hooked! Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: An 18+ Visual Novel set in the early 2000s, about three girls trying to make their way into the adult entertainment industry! They meet you, a clueless fisherman, who has no idea about his potential.
